items.title: Why Sarah Ferguson, Beatrice and Eugenie can't escape the taint of family scandal
items.description: The scandal engulfing Andrew is of his own making but has had a profound impact on his immediate family.

items.title: Former England goalkeeper Mary Earps announces 'happy' same-sex relationship
items.description: Earps has been supported and encouraged by her former Lionesses teammates to open up about her sexuality.

items.title: Several hundred feared dead as Tanzania election protests continue
items.description: A diplomatic source tells the BBC there is credible evidence that at least 500 people had died.

items.title: 'No inch here was spared': Hurricane Melissa destroys Jamaica town
